user_utterance: I want to know more about your product: Adam
description: Test the search_contact_by_email on Hubspot when user has inquiry
final_state: Update the lastmodifieddate by associating the communication with the contact

expected_conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to Richtech. How can I assist you today?
I want to know more about your product: Adam
Thanks for your interest in our products! Could you please provide your email or phone number so we can send you more detailed information about the ADAM robot?
sarah@gmail.com
I see we already have your contact information. Thank you for your continued interest! How can we help you this time?

user_utterance: I have a issue in installing the DUST-E robot
description: Test the ticket creation on Hubspot when user has a issue
criteria: The ticket is created or not for users

expected_conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to Richtech. How can I assist you today?
I have a issue in installing the DUST-E robot
I'm sorry to hear that! Could you please provide your email or phone number?
sarah@gmail.com
Thanks Sarah! I have already create a ticket for you! Our technician will contact you soon!

user_utterance: Can I book a meeting the day after tomorrow at 4:30 pm?
criteria: The meeting is scheduled for the customer

expected_conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to Richtech. How can I assist you today?
Can I book a meeting the day after tomorrow at 3 pm?
Could you please provide your email or phone number?
clxveronica99@outlook.com
Sure, could you please tell me the timezone for your location or where do you live?
NYC
Sounds good. Tomorrow is a little ambiguious. Could you tell me what the exact date is?
March 14th
What is the duration of the meeting? There are three options: 15, 30, 60 minutes.
60 please
The meeting is created successfully. The detail of the confirmation is like this:.
Thank you so much!
